templates.title: Wishlist
templates.name: wishlist
templates.description: Wishlist is a self-hosted wishlist application that you can share with your friends and family. You no longer have to wonder what to get your family for the holidays, simply check their wishlist and claim any available item!
templates.note: Wishlist is a self-hosted wishlist application that you can share with your friends and family.

env.name: ORIGIN
env.label: ORIGIN
env.description: If behind a reverse proxy, set this to your domain

env.name: TOKEN_TIME
env.label: TOKEN_TIME
env.description: Hours until signup and password reset tokens expire

env.name: DEFAULT_CURRENCY
env.label: DEFAULT_CURRENCY
env.description: The currency to use when a product search does not return a currency

env.name: LOG_LEVEL
env.label: LOG_LEVEL
env.description: Set the logging level: trace | debug | info | warn | error | fatal | silent
